description:
Big and Bright Display

With the Redmi 10.6 Pad Tablet's expansive 10.61-inch LCD screen and an incredible 2000x1200 resolution, you can catch up on your favourite shows even when you’re on the fly. Besides, its 90Hz refresh rate not only enhances gaming but also reduces eye strain during long hours of reading or browsing.


Turbocharged Efficiency

Equipped with a speedy 2.2GHz octa-core MediaTek Helio G99 processor and 4GB RAM, this tablet offers fast performance and can uninterruptedly juggle multiple tasks, ensuring a high level of efficiency.


Android 12 MIUI 13

The intuitive design of the Android 12 MIUI 13 operating system enhances the overall user experience, making it easy for you to perform tasks and navigate through the tablet effortlessly.


Wi-Fi 5 Connectivity

Enjoy uninterrupted online browsing and streaming with this tab's advanced Wi-Fi 5 technology, which offers fast and trustworthy internet access.


Capture Beautiful Photos

Boost your photography and videography endeavours with this tablet's 8MP camera, which can capture detailed and vibrant stills and videos. Plus, you can easily attend video conference calls with your co-workers or see your family whenever you miss them with the advanced 8MP front camera of this device.


A Wealth of Storage Space

Organise your apps, photos, videos, and important documents on the 10.61-inch tab, which is equipped with a capacious internal storage capacity of 128GB.


Massive Battery Capacity

Delight in uninterrupted entertainment, productivity, and communication on this Redmi tablet, owing to its 8000mAh battery. What’s more, owing to its 18W fast-charging capability, this tablet can swiftly charge up.


Split Screen Efficiency

When you need to increase productivity and finish difficult jobs quickly, you can effortlessly run up to two windows at the same time on this tab.

keyFeature6: 8 MP Rear Camera, 8 MP Front Camera

• 10.61 inches (26.95 cm) Display, 90 Hz Refresh Rate
  • 4 GB RAM, 128GB ROM
  • MediaTek Helio G99, 8 Core
  • MIUI 13 Android 12
  • 8000 mAh Battery with 18 W Fast Charging

variantProductsInfo.description:
Vivid Visuals

Whether you're video conferencing, reading books, or watching your favourite shows, the Redmi 10.6 Pad Tablet's 10.61-inch 2000x1200 LCD screen enhances your interactions with captivating clarity. Additionally, its 90Hz refresh rate plays a crucial role in reducing screen tearing, thus giving you a smooth and more visually satisfying viewing experience, especially during high-speed scenes.


Lag-Free Multitasking

This tablet's efficient 2.2GHz octa-core MediaTek Helio G99 processor and 6GB RAM let you effortlessly switch between multiple apps with ease, thereby boosting your productivity.


Android 12 MIUI 13

This tablet boasts an Android 12 MIUI 13 operating system that is intuitive and user-friendly, ensuring an enjoyable experience as you effortlessly navigate through apps, settings, and features.


Wi-Fi 5 Connectivity

With its Wi-Fi 5 technology, this tab provides fast and trustworthy internet access. This way, it ensures a seamless digital experience.


Complete Camera System

Boost your photography and videography endeavours with this tablet's 8MP camera, which can capture detailed and vibrant stills and videos. Plus, its 8MP front camera ensures that you can have clear face-to-face conversations with your loved ones or co-workers.


Expansive Storage

Ensure that you never run out of storage space for your media content with the 10.61-inch tab, which features an expansive 128GB storage capacity.


Long-Lasting Power

With a durable 8000mAh battery providing a life of up to, this Redmi tablet ensures a consistent power supply, making it ideal for extended gaming or video streaming.


Dual-Window Productivity

Boost efficiency and tackle challenging tasks with ease on this tab by effortlessly running up to two windows simultaneously.
variantProductsInfo.name: Redmi 10.6 Pad Wi-Fi Android 12 MIUI 13 Tablet (10.61 Inches, 4GB RAM, 128GB ROM, Graphite Gray)
